summary: As a vicious wild boar terrorizes the Australian outback, the husband of one of the victims is joined by a hunter and a farmer in a search for the beast.
cast: Gregory Harrison|Arkie Whiteley|Bill Kerr|Chris Haywood|David Argue|Judy Morris|John Howard|John Ewart|Don Smith|Mervyn Drake|Redmond Phillips|Alan Becher|Peter Schwarz|Beth Child|Rick Kennedy|Chris Hession|Brian Adams|Jinx Lootens|Angus Malone|Peter Boswell|Don Lane
title: Razorback: Los colmillos del infierno
